Interface SpringHandlerRegistry

public interface SpringHandlerRegistry
A registry interface for registering Spring-based handler components with e.g.: a TestFixture.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    io.fluxzero.common.Registration
    registerHandlers(List<?> handlers)
    Registers the given list of handlers with the registry.

  • Method Details

    • registerHandlers

      io.fluxzero.common.Registration registerHandlers(List<?> handlers)
      Registers the given list of handlers with the registry.
      Parameters:
      handlers - a list of handler components to be registered. The handlers could represent beans, interceptors, or other Spring-related handler types.
      Returns:
      a Registration instance that allows cancellation of the registered handlers.
